author: rleland
msg: Bug 13526 Sumbitted By turner@blackbear.com (James Turner)
Applied patch to remove required for basic field types.
Uses are still free to place depends="required" in their own
fields definitions.
Thanks !

author: rleland
msg: Bug 11950 reopened by areus@ibit.org
Bug 13836 opened by rleland@apache.org
and reported by jholmes@apache.org
changed:
The formName is now again used as a flag
to indicate that the <script></script> should be
included around javascript.
Bug 13836 - uncovered one condition where
a //End --> comment could be printed without a
<!-- Begin, which was onlty ehibited by mixing a
new struts.jar with old validator example code.
Also added htmlComment attribute to indicate
wheather the html comment should wrap
the javascript.

msg: first draft of html package description

author: dmkarr
msg: Added test for iterating over EL-valued collection.

author: dmkarr
msg: Removed reflection-based property descriptor (just to be consistent).
Provided both getter and setter names, although getter is null (as we don't
need that for this).
